fooApi.subtitle: Public
fooApi.description: This is an demo public endpoint which requires no authentication.

whoAmIApi.subtitle: Authorized role: USER
whoAmIApi.description: The regular endpoint which returns the current user information. You have to sign in as either a User or an Admin to gain the access to this endpoint.

usersApi.subtitle: Authorized role: ADMIN
usersApi.description: This endpoint will give you a list of all the users. You have to sign in as an Admin to gain the access to this endpoint.

login.title: Login
login.badCredentials: Didn't recognize this credentials. Please try again

username.latinAlphanumeric: Usernames must only contain latin alphanumeric
username.size: Username must be between 4 and 20 characters long

password.anyUpper: Password must contain at least one upper character
password.anyLower: Password must contain at least one lower character
password.anyDigit: Password must contain at least one digit character
password.anySpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
password.size: Password must be between 6 and 100 characters long

firstname.latinLetters: Firstname must contain only latin letters
firstname.maxlength: Firstname must be less than 50 characters

lastname.latinLetters: Lastname must contain only latin letters
lastname.maxlength: Lastname must be less than 50 characters
